name: Information Systems
description: Bachelor-level program focusing on the design, implementation, and management of information systems.

name: Management and Analysis of Massive Data
description: Masters-level program focusing on data management and big data analysis techniques.

name: Artificial Intelligence and Information Processing
description: Masters-level program emphasizing artificial intelligence and information processing methods.

name: Engineering of Complex Software
description: Masters-level program specializing in the engineering and development of complex software systems.

name: Networks and Information Security
description: Masters-level program focusing on computer networks and cybersecurity.

name: Embedded Systems and Mobility
description: Masters-level program centered on embedded systems and mobile technology.

name: Information Systems and Decision
description: Masters-level program addressing decision-making processes supported by information systems.
